extendedInfo.description: Become billionaire Tony Stark as Iron Man in this free, fast-paced, endless runner, the official game of the upcoming movie!After the events of Iron Man 3, Tony has become a peacekeeper, but new threats emerge regularly all around the globe and Iron Man is the only one who can take care of them. Get ready for intense action in this free, addictive, endless 3D runner!THE OFFICIAL GAME OF THE MOST AWAITED SUPERHERO MOVIE, FOR FREE!âFight against rising A.I.M. forces around the world during amazing runsâDiscover 3 different locations offering endless, self-generating levels: Malibu Shores, New York City and China âConfront 4 epic villains from the Iron Man comics: Crimson Dynamo, Ezekiel Stane, Living Laser and the mighty M.O.D.O.K.BECOME IRON MAN AS NEVER BEFORE!âComplete various missions in fast-paced flying battles and epic one-on-one confrontationsâUnleash Iron Man's superpowers with amazingly responsive swipe controlsâEnjoy an outstanding 3D world with cutting-edge graphics and animationsCOMMAND STARK INDUSTRIESâResearch and develop up to 18 suits from the different movies (MARK II, MARK 42, Silver Centurion, etc.)âUpgrade your armours and powers in the research Lab to wipe out your enemiesFor all fans of superhero games, runner games, action games, arcade games, Marvel games, and for all of those who want to fight as Iron Man during amazing and intense free runs.Iron Man 3 â The Official Game from the upcoming Marvel movie is a free-to-play game, but if you wish, you can enrich your experience by purchasing game items to boost your progress!Enjoy Gameloft's other arcade and action game from Marvel Comics:The Amazing Spider-Man: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftAMHMFind and power up Iron Man's suits in a great game at www.IronMan3.com.au for your chance to win awesome prizes including a tablet, an iPod touch and in-game credit for the Iron Man 3 game. Have you found MK17 - HEARTBREAKER (Artillery Level RT Suit) yet? Need another clue? âThe southernmost tip of the Australian mainlandâ. Go to www.ironman3.com.au, solve the riddle and find the suit! This promotion is available only in Australia and New Zealand!Iron Man 3 delivers the best experience on powerful devices. You can also enjoy a good experience on a lot of other devices.However, we invite you to first check your hardware capabilities.The minimum recommended hardware to play Iron Man 3:	- 1 GHz CPU.	- PowerVR SGX540 GPU or equivalent	- 500 MB RAM.	- 860 MB free space----Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.comFollow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/GameloftDiscover our blog at http://glft.co/Gameloft_Official_Blog for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.Certain apps allow you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third party advertisements that may redirect you to a third party site.Terms of use : http://www.gameloft.com/conditions/

reviews.title: Fun but won\'t save my high score
reviews.comment: Very good graphics and a great time killer but they need to make an update for this glitch my high score isn\'t being recorded and I can\'t participate in the weekly tournament because of it, please fix soon
reviews.author: Luis Perez

reviews.title: GREAT GAME
reviews.comment: Simple yet challenging gameplay. Great graphics. The gyroscope controls are the best way of experiencing this game!!! \342\231\245ing this game at the moment!!! :)
reviews.author: Karl Campbell

reviews.title: Cool games
reviews.comment: Very like it..  Cool graphics and cool armor. If there\'s more armor I think it would be nice..
reviews.author: Denyawan Haryadi

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: It\'s a very good game. Cool graphics and good places. Only, in my dell streak the romeo and hot rod become white, pls fix this. Btw, awesome
reviews.author: Raymond Nathaniel

reviews.comment: This game is so addictive. I love it. The controls work great on my phone.\tI love this game. The control is awesome.:-)
reviews.author: Andrew Craker

reviews.title: Fun but why so much money?
reviews.comment: This would be more entertaining if the suits were a lil easier to obtain. The concept is AWESOME. Pricing is way too much.
reviews.author: G Lewis Rodgers II

reviews.title: Addicting game
reviews.comment: I really love. Cant stop playing. Plus the graphics are awesome! A must have  The latest updates fixed many bugs
reviews.author: Jonathan De Felice

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Love the visuals and game play.. Once again a great addition to the creativity. We all would love to see a game, \"Super Mario\" to be released by your team also, thanks. Love Iron Man 3!
reviews.author: Shahdeen Sohail

reviews.title: Great,cool,awsome
reviews.comment: Best game ever made on android
reviews.author: william hawker

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good game... Entertaining, addictive and friggin awesome! Keep it updated more frequently!
reviews.author: Bogdan Zookey

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Excellent game. Actually makes you feel like Iron Man. Has good graphics and excellent replayability.
reviews.author: Steven Lay

reviews.comment: Really cool graphically, and might just be the first game I actually pay for upgrade.\tCool and looks graphically stunning on an HTC One.
reviews.author: Dave G

reviews.title: Good game...
reviews.comment: I enjoy this game, 3d good,excellent for gameloft.. keep going to do more games like this. Upgrade more map and weapon ironman 3..
reviews.author: mohamad saharizal

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Game looks really good graphics r very nice and there is a bunch of suits to unlock. But wish there was a little more diversity among the suits. Overall a good looking game
reviews.author: freddy medina

reviews.title: Awesome very awesome
reviews.comment: More awesome than the most awesome game
reviews.author: Belo Bassem

reviews.title: Great Game!! :-)
reviews.comment: Love this game! Very cool and graphics are very cool. It helps to relax while flying. Lol :-)
reviews.author: DerekanAmanda Crockett

reviews.title: Cool Power!
reviews.comment: Improved game play... KEEP IT UP. Suggestions: Please fix or remove the pop out trucks & billboards. They suddenly appear at your front and your damaged before you know it. Very annoying. Please add an option to convert XP points into Stark credits Like: 2500xp = 500credits & et\'al. Please add repair powerup in the game which can also be upgraded. Like it initially revives 15% then 60% if upgraded. Please add money or gem bonus in the master challenge. Allow the missles shotdown. Thanks!
reviews.author: Rhed SANTOS

reviews.title: All I can say is awesome game
reviews.comment: Great graphics, good action, and fun to play. And there is a multi-player mode too. Only one word can be used. Awesome.
reviews.author: James Walston T. Jr.

reviews.title: I can\'t play
reviews.comment: I can\'t play it keeps lagging everytime the game starts .
reviews.author: martine lucencia

reviews.title: Its sucks
reviews.comment: This is the 3rd times it stuck at loading after every patch. Thought I can re install to play which I did before and I have to restart as new again w/ all progress data GONE.
reviews.author: Zeal CS
